text: Bashu, the Little Stranger () is a 1986 Iranian drama movie directed by Bahram Beizai and starring Susan Taslimi, Parviz Poorhosseini. It was considered at the best film of the 1980's in Iranian cinema. ==Other websites== * Category:1986 drama movies Category:Iranian movies Category:Movies directed by Bahram Beizai
title: Bashu, the Little Stranger
